definitions.text: profane or obscene expression usually of surprise or anger
an appeal to some supernatural power to inflict evil on someone or some group

examples: a witch put a curse on his whole family
he put the whammy on me
The drunken men were cursing loudly in the street
The taxi driver who felt he didn't get a high enough tip cursed the passenger

definitions.text: wish harm upon; invoke evil upon
examples: The bad witch cursed the child

definitions.text: exclude from a church or a religious community
examples: The gay priest was excommunicated when he married his partner
